snippet: The governor of the Bank of England, Mark J. Carney, said interest rates could rise before the end of the year. The pound rose and British stocks fell.
abstract: Mark J Carney, Bank of England governor, warns interest rates could rise sooner than markets expected; announcement comes as pound nears five-year highs against dollar.
lead_paragraph: The governor of the Bank of England, Mark J. Carney, said interest rates could rise before the end of the year. The pound rose and British stocks fell.

headline.seo: Mark Carney Warns of Rate Increase in Britain
headline.main: Pound Rises Against Dollar After Rate Increase Warning
headline.print_headline: Hints at Interest Rate Increase, and Pound Jumps
